subject: Re: [sugar] Sugar datastore broken
body:
On May 27, 2007, at 11:23 , Marco Pesenti Gritti wrote:

> Dan Williams wrote:
>> On Sun, 2007-05-27 at 02:02 +0200, J.M. Maurer wrote:
>>
>>> It seems the datastore prevents any activity from starting up  
>>> with the
>>> latest sugar. As I'm not familiar with any of that, I'll leave  
>>> fixing it
>>> to the pros :)
>>>
>>
>> Did you do a './sugar-jhbuild build meta-sugar-platform'?  This  
>> could be
>> a case of the datastore not having the right pieces built.
>>
>> Try running "./sugar-jhbuild shell" and then
>> 'build/bin/datastore-service' and see if it traces back or something.
>>
>> Dan
>>
>
> It could also just be a lock in your profile. Try to delete
> ~/.sugar/datastore.

That's what I do every time before starting Sugar to make it behave ...

- Bert -
